drills.title: Wall Form Shooting
drills.summary: Groove clean mechanics without chasing rebounds by isolating form against a wall.
instructions: Stand 1–2 feet from the wall with balanced feet and knees bent.
Lock guide hand on the side, keep eyes on a target spot.
Shoot softly, ensuring follow-through ends with fingers pointed at target.
Track arc and rotation; adjust grip and elbow alignment as needed.

drills.title: One-Hand Form Shooting
drills.summary: Build wrist snap and release consistency using only the shooting hand.
instructions: Start 3–5 feet from the basket; guide hand stays behind your back.
Bend knees, lift through toes, and finish with full extension.
Hold follow-through until the ball drops through.
Move back one step after each successful set.
drills.coachingCue: Elbow under the ball, fingers to the sky.

drills.title: Elbow to Elbow Rhythm Shooting
drills.summary: Develop mid-range confidence by repping both elbows with game-footwork.
instructions: Start at right elbow with inside foot pivot; lift into balanced jumper.
Slide to left elbow and repeat; use inside-foot pivots on each catch.
Add a shot fake + side dribble after each 10 makes for variety.
Record makes/misses to track progress.

drills.title: Pass, Catch & Shoot Series
drills.summary: Simulate game tempo with quick catches, square-ups, and immediate release.
instructions: Partner delivers chest pass; catch on hop with hands ready.
Square shoulders midair, land balanced, release in one motion.
Alternate left/right catches to mimic relocation.
Sprint to next spot after each make; repeat for wing, corner, top.
Optional: add defender closing out for pressure.

drills.title: Step-Back Separation Drill
drills.summary: Create space with powerful brakes and pop-back balance before knocking it down.
instructions: Attack forward with two hard dribbles; plant inside foot.
Push back explosively, landing behind original spot.
Square shoulders mid-air; shoot on controlled balance.
Alternate left/right finishes, add counter (cross-step) on final set.

drills.title: Figure 8 Control Drill
drills.summary: Fine-tune touch and coordination weaving the ball around your legs.
instructions: Stand wide, stay low, and pound the ball around each leg in a figure 8.
Use fingertips for control; keep eyes forward.
Switch directions and hands every 30 seconds.
Add two-ball variation for advanced challenge.

drills.title: Cone Crossover Gauntlet
drills.summary: Sharpen violent change-of-direction moves under control through a cone alley.
instructions: Space cones 3 feet apart; sprint to each, plant outside foot.
Snap crossover tight to body, burst to next cone.
Finish each run with controlled floater or layup.
Progress to behind-the-back and between-the-legs series.
drills.coachingCue: Snap the crossover, protect the ball.

drills.title: Spider Speed Series
drills.summary: Explode hand speed by alternating front/back taps under the hips.
instructions: Tap ball in front with right, then back with right, repeat with left.
Keep hips low, torso still, eyes ahead.
Count total taps each round to gamify progress.
Add two-ball spider for advanced athletes.

drills.title: Two-Ball Rhythm Builder
drills.summary: Train both hands equally with simultaneous and alternating pound dribbles.
instructions: Start with simultaneous waist-high pounds for 15 seconds.
Switch to alternating dribbles, then high-low combo.
Stay balanced with still torso and eyes up.
Add movement (walk to baseline and back) on final round.

drills.title: Z-Pattern Attack & Burst
drills.summary: Combine speed and deception by attacking zig-zag cones with varied finishes.
instructions: Set cones in staggered Z pattern across court.
Explode to each cone with change-of-pace dribble move.
Finish with power layup or pull-up at baseline.
Run final set vs. live defender for pressure.

drills.title: Zig-Zag Slide Series
drills.summary: Build lateral quickness and stance endurance the length of the court.
instructions: Start in low stance; slide to angled marker without crossing feet.
Drop hips on each change, recover with quick first step.
Sprint to baseline after third slide to simulate transition.
Repeat facing opposite direction.
drills.coachingCue: Chest up, feet wide, hands alive.

drills.title: High-Hand Closeouts
drills.summary: Sharpen approach speed and control when contesting shooters.
instructions: Start in help position; on pass, sprint to shooter.
Chop feet to avoid overrunning; contest with outside hand.
Slide to cut baseline drive if shooter attacks.
Rotate back to help spot; repeat from weak-side.

drills.title: Mirror Reaction Drill
drills.summary: 1-on-1 partner shadowing to develop instincts and discipline.
instructions: Leader moves randomly within marked box for 30 seconds.
Defender mirrors with quick slides, no hopping.
Swap roles; focus on eyes on hips of the leader.
Add ball fakes and spins for advanced challenge.

drills.title: 4-Out Shell Communication
drills.summary: Team defensive staple emphasising rotation, help, and talk.
instructions: Align four offensive players around perimeter; defense reacts to passes.
Practice jump-to-ball, help-and-recover, and weak-side stunts.
Add dribble penetration and skip passes; require verbal tags.
Finish with live 4-on-4 closeout to contest shot.

drills.title: Transition Sprint & Protect
drills.summary: Simulate odd-man breaks to ingrain urgency and paint protection.
instructions: Begin 3 defenders vs 4 attackers; offense pushes in transition.
First defender stops ball, others protect rim and shooters.
After shot, sprint to opposite end with roles flipped.
Track stops to benchmark urgency.

drills.title: Power Lunge Strength Complex
drills.summary: Lower-body strength session that translates to explosive first steps.
instructions: 12 alternating reverse lunges with dumbbells.
10 explosive split squat jumps (bodyweight).
8 single-leg box step-ups each leg focusing on drive.
Rest 60 seconds; repeat for three quality rounds.

drills.title: Footwork Ladder Flow
drills.summary: High-tempo coordination ladder to sharpen foot speed and balance.
instructions: Run in-in-out pattern down ladder, light on feet.
Add icky shuffle, lateral in-in-out, and crossover steps.
Finish with backwards run maintaining posture.
Rest 20 seconds between patterns; repeat twice.

drills.title: Full-Court Conditioning Intervals
drills.summary: Basketball-specific sprint intervals mixing pace changes and finishes.
instructions: Sprint full court for layup, jog back to baseline.
Slide laterally baseline-to-baseline, then backpedal to half court.
Finish minute with free throws under controlled breathing.
Rest 45 seconds between cycles.

drills.title: Mobility Reset & Recovery
drills.summary: Targeted mobility flow to keep joints healthy after intense sessions.
instructions: World's greatest stretch both sides (45 sec each).
Deep squat pry with thoracic reach (60 seconds).
Hip flexor pulses + hamstring sweep (45 seconds each leg).
Banded shoulder opener with controlled breathing (2 minutes).
drills.coachingCue: Breathe through tension, control each range.

drills.title: Contrast Recovery Protocol
drills.summary: Alternate hot and cold exposure to accelerate recovery between sessions.
instructions: Immerse in cold (10–12°C) for 2 minutes focusing on breathing.
Transition to warm (38–40°C) for 2 minutes to encourage blood flow.
Repeat cycle three times, ending in cold for inflammation control.
Hydrate and perform light mobility work after session.
